de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.data.model

Class KMeansModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.data.model.AbstractModel
      • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.data.model.PrototypeModel<Vector>
        • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.data.model.MeanModel
          • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.data.model.KMeansModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Model, TextWriteable

    public class KMeansModel
extends MeanModel
    Trivial subclass of the MeanModel that indicates the clustering to be produced by k-means (so the Voronoi cell visualization is sensible).
    Author:
    Erich Schubert
